mapper.insert: insert into User( user_name, password, user_type, enabled, reg_date, name, mobile, area_id, address, zip_code, qq, id_card, account, institution_id, start_date, term, auth_type, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values( #{userName}, PASSWORD(#{password}), #{userType}, #{enabled}, SYSDATE(), #{name}, #{mobile}, #{areaId}, #{address}, #{zipCode}, #{qq}, #{idCard}, #{account}, #{institutionId}, #{startDate}, #{term}, #{authType}, 0, SYSDATE(), 0, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT user_name userName, password password, user_type userType, enabled enabled, reg_date regDate, name name, mobile mobile, area_id areaId, address address, zip_code zipCode, qq qq, id_card idCard, account account, institution_id institutionId, start_date startDate, term term, auth_type authType, create_user createUser, create_time createTime, update_user updateUser, update_time updateTime FROM user

SELECT user_name userName, password password, user_type userType, enabled enabled, reg_date regDate, name name, mobile mobile, area_id areaId, address address, zip_code zipCode, qq qq, id_card idCard, account account, institution_id institutionId, start_date startDate, term term, auth_type authType, create_user createUser, create_time createTime, update_user updateUser, update_time updateTime FROM user WHERE password=PASSWORD(#{password}) and (user_name = #{userName} or mobile= #{userName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET password = PASSWORD(#{password}) WHERE id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM user WHERE mobile = #{mobile}
